delete.confirmation: All your data on {{company}} is now erased.
delete.description: We’ve received a request to delete your {{company}} account. Click on the button below to proceed. It is valid for 10 minutes.
delete.errorDescription: Please try again to delete your account.
delete.headline: Account deleted
delete.resetText: If you did not ask for this, you should <link>
delete.surveyText:
Thanks for using {{company}}.
If you’d like, you can
This will take no longer than a minute.
delete.title: Delete Account

forgot.errorAlreadyProcessing: We already sent you an email. The link is valid for 1 hour.
forgot.errorInvalidEmail: That does not look like an email.
forgot.errorUnknown: Something went wrong, please try again.
forgot.successDescription: We sent you a link to reset your password. It is valid for 1 hour.
forgot.title: Reset password
forgot.description: We will send you a link to reset your password via email.

index.description: Business chats, one-click conference calls and shared documents – all protected with end-to-end encryption. Also available for personal use.
index.title: The most secure collaboration platform

open.description: To sign in and start using {{company}}, launch the application.

reset.errorInvalidLink: The link is not valid. Please try again.
reset.errorUnknown: Something went wrong, please try again.
reset.passwordInfo: Use at least {{minPasswordLength}} characters, with one lowercase letter, one capital letter, a number, and a special character.
reset.successDescription: You can now log in with your new password.
reset.title: Password reset

verify.error404Description: Please try to create your account again.
verify.error500Description: We are investigating the issue, please check back shortly.
verify.successBotDescription: Please note that upon successful verification of your e-mail, your {{company}} service provider account is still subject to approval through our staff, which usually happens within 24 hours.
verify.successBotDescriptionEmail: You will be informed of the approval via a separate e-mail.
verify.successEmailAppDescription: Install the app to start using {{company}}.
verify.title: Verifying

conversationJoin.description: Audio and video conferencing, text messaging, file sharing, and screen sharing, all end-to-end-encrypted.
conversationJoin.wirelessHeadline: Don't have a {{brandName}} account? You can join as temporary guest in the browser.
conversationJoin.errorConversationNotFoundDescription: The link to this group conversation has expired or is no longer valid.
conversationJoin.title: You have been invited to join a conversation in {{brandName}}
conversationJoin.cannotJoinOnMobile: At the moment, you can't join this conversation on your mobile device. Please open this link on your desktop instead.

conversationJoinSelfHosted.title: You have been invited to join a conversation in Wire

userProfile.title: You have been invited to view a user profile in {{brandName}}
userProfile.description: Audio and video conferencing, text messaging, file sharing, and screen sharing, all end-to-end-encrypted.

migration.layoutListHeader1: Use the same level of security and enjoy extra features and benefits for free, like:
migration.layoutListItem4: Option to upgrade to Wire for Enterprise to get full collaboration benefits
migration.layoutListItem5: Open Wire and get connected with your new team members
migration.layoutListItem6: Enjoy conference calls with a single click
migration.welcomePageHeader: Congratulations, you joined your team on Wire!
migration.welcomePageSubHeader:
Welcome to {{teamName}}
We transferred your personal account into a team member account.
migration.confirmPageSubHeader: To ensure a secure transfer and prevent unauthorized access, please enter the password of your personal account again.
migration.termsPageSubHeader: You’re about to join the team managed by {{email}}.
migration.termsPageListItem1: Your personal account will be transferred to a team account.
migration.termsPageListItem3: One team limit: You can only be part of one team with this email address.
migration.termsPageListItem4: You keep your contacts and your conversation history.
migration.termsPageListItem5: Profile details: You keep your email, profile name, and username, as well as your password and profile picture.
migration.termsPageAccountManagerText: As you will be part of a team, the admin can remove you from the team. In that case, you will immediately lose access to your account, contacts, history, and username.
migration.termsPageRecommendationItem1: Verify the admin’s identity before accepting, and if you’re unsure, close this window.
migration.termsPageMigrationTerms: I agree to the migration terms and understand that this change is irreversible.
migration.invitationPageSubHeader: Log in with your personal account's email or username and password.
